sentences.en: Mr. Solicitor - General then, following his leader's lead, examined the patriot : John Barsad, gentleman, by name.
sentences.cn: 副检察长先生于是跟随他上司的榜样询问了爱国志士: 此人是约翰-巴萨先生.

sentences.en: Solicitor: Do you consider Ms mentally could be mentally ill?
sentences.cn: 调查员: 您认为女士有精神方面的疾病 么 ?

sentences.en: The case will Be presented By the Solicitor General.
sentences.cn: 这一案子将由副检察长受理.

sentences.en: The most - mentioned names include Diane Wood and Merrick Garland, both appeals - court judges Elena Kagan, the solicitor - general.
sentences.cn: 被提及最多的人包括上诉法庭法官迪亚娜·伍兹和梅里克·加兰 、 副检察长 埃琳娜·卡根 .

sentences.en: The owner of this great estate was a local solicitor.
sentences.cn: 这处大房产的主人是一位本地法务官.

sentences.en: The solicitor asks for a payment of $ 100 on account.
sentences.cn: 初级律师要求预付100美元.

sentences.en: The solicitor has already obtained an insurance agent or insurance broker practice license.
sentences.cn: 已领得保险代理人或保险经纪人执业证书者.

sentences.en: The solicitor has included a false statement in a registration application document.
sentences.cn: 申请登录之文件有虚伪之记载者.

sentences.en: When the defence offer $ 1, 000, the plaintiff's solicitor say he will take his client's instructions.
sentences.cn: 当被告方提出1, 000美元, 原告律师说他将听取他委托人的指示.

sentences.en: You need to see a solicitor.

words.tran_cn: 请愿者,游说者,宣传员,拉皮条的,推销员

trans.tran_cn: 初级律师，恳求者，求婚者，〈美〉掮客，募捐人
trans.tran_en: a type of lawyer in Britain who gives legal advice, prepares the necessary documents when property is bought or sold, and defends people, especially in the lower courts of law
